name: Balls vs Bricks Challenge
description:
Swipe your finger to guide a chain of Balls and break the bricks.
Try to break as many bricks as possible.
Get additional balls and make the biggest balls chain ever!

Very easy to play but very hard to reach high scores!

Game Features:
- Free to play
- Endless gameplay
- Simple swipe control
- Challenge your friends with the best highscore
- You can remove Ads via IAP to play ads free version.

Download & Enjoy Ballz vs Bricks!
